headline: American Oncology Network Central Lab Receives Reaccreditation from College of American Pathologists
summary: FORT MYERS, Fla., July 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- American Oncology Network (AON), one of the nation’s fastest-growing networks of community oncology practices, has received reaccreditation from the Accreditation Committee of the College of American Pathologists (CAP) for its Central Laboratory in Fort Myers, Florida. The recognition follows a recent on-site inspection conducted as part of the CAP’s Accreditation Programs. Recognized for its rigorous standards and commitment to quality, CAP ac
